metadata.title: CVE-2022-3132 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Goolytics WordPress plugin before 1.1.2 does not sanitise and escapesome of its settings, which could allow high privilege users to performCross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability isdisallowed.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
